definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: coll. Children (as going with quick, tripping steps; Eth. t’af: Di:1251)—[[טַף]] Je 41:16 + 11 t.; [[טָָף]] Je 40:7 + 5 t.; sf. [[טַפֵּנוּ]] Ge 43:8 + 5 t.; [[טַפְּכֶם]] Ge 45:19 + 10 t.; [[טַפָּם]] Ge 34:29 + 6 t.; never cstr. and never pl. (in Ge 47:24 om. LXX, cf. Di);—children, little ones, Ge 34:29 (E) + 18 t. JE (Gn Ex Nu), also De 1:39 + 8 t. D (incl. Jos 1:14, Jos 8:35); P only Nu 31:9, Nu 31:17, Nu 31:18, where note [[זָכָר בַּטָָּף]] v:Nu 31:17 = young boys, and [[הַטַף בַּנׇּשִׁים]] v:Nu 31:18 = young girls; also Ju Jdg 18:21, Jdg 21:10, 2Sa 15:22, Je 40:7, Je 41:16, Je 43:6, Ez Eze 9:6, 2Ch 20:13, 2Ch 31:18, Ezr 8:21, Es 3:13, Es 8:11; the words [[מְתִים וְנׇשִׁים וְהַטָָף]] De 2:34, De 3:6 incl. all inhabitants; so [[אֲנׇשִׁים וְהַנָּשִׁים וְהַטָּף]] De 31:12, Je 40:7, Je 43:6; [[טַף]] distinguished from [[בָּחוּר וּבְּתוּלָה]] Ez Eze 9:6; also from [[בְּנֵיהֶם]] 2Ch 20:13, and from [[בְנֵיהֶם וּבְנוֹתֵיהֶם]] 2Ch 31:18.
